name: Alien Plants v1: Evolution simulation
description:
Evolution simulation for a simple model of plants.

Explore a group of plants that launch theirs seeds to spread and evolve. Plants adapt their traits to the terrain and will ultimately optimize for quick growth.

This first version of the Alien Plants project is a re-edition of the original prototype published in 2013. 

Warning: Don't leave the simulation running unattended, plants will find a way to reproduce quickly and you'll need to kill the application (or just press ESC if you see it start lagging)

Watch this video where I explain common behaviors of the plants in this simulation.

Two more simulations upcoming that improve on the same mechanics:

Alien Plants: Explorer
Alien Plants: New World

Follow my itch.io profile to receive updates on the project.
